attributes.action: Instruct the BBC to broadcast charity appeals for Gaza
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC is refusing to broadcast a humanitarian appeal for the people of Gaza.

They say that doing so would threaten their impartiality.

Helping people in need is not a political stance.

The BBC is therefore costing lives needlessly.

The Prime Minister should instruct the BBC to help the British people to help the people of Gaza.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
